comments: Also (with offset = 1) 2.5*e = Sum_{n>=1} A000326(n)/n!. - _Richard R. Forberg_, Jul 15 2013
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=10*exp(1)/4; for (n=0, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b019741.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 10 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Fixed my PARI program, had -n. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 19 2009
